Class JsonPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kii.cloud.unity.JsonPath

  • public class JsonPath
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for JSONPath. This class supports simple JSONPath only.
    Author:
    noriyoshi.fukuzaki@kii.com
